schema:
directive @weather_cacheControl(maxAge: Int, scope: weather_CacheControlScope) on FIELD_DEFINITION | INTERFACE | OBJECT

enum weather_CacheControlScope {
  PRIVATE
  PUBLIC
}

type weather_City {
  coord: weather_Coordinates
  country: String
  id: ID
  name: String
  weather: weather_Weather
}

type weather_Clouds {
  all: Int
  humidity: Int
  visibility: Int
}

input weather_ConfigInput {
  lang: weather_Language
  units: weather_Unit
}

type weather_Coordinates {
  lat: Float
  lon: Float
}

enum weather_Language {
  af
  al
  ar
  az
  bg
  ca
  cz
  da
  de
  el
  en
  es
  eu
  fa
  fi
  fr
  gl
  he
  hi
  hr
  hu
  id
  it
  ja
  kr
  la
  lt
  mk
  nl
  no
  pl
  pt
  pt_br
  ro
  ru
  se
  sk
  sl
  sp
  sr
  sv
  th
  tr
  ua
  uk
  vi
  zh_cn
  zh_tw
  zu
}

type Query {
  weather_getCityById(config: weather_ConfigInput, id: [String!]): [weather_City]
  weather_getCityByName(config: weather_ConfigInput, country: String, name: String!): weather_City
}

type weather_Summary {
  description: String
  icon: String
  title: String
}

type weather_Temperature {
  actual: Float
  feelsLike: Float
  max: Float
  min: Float
}

enum weather_Unit {
  imperial
  kelvin
  metric
}

"""The `Upload` scalar type represents a file upload."""
scalar weather_Upload

type weather_Weather {
  clouds: weather_Clouds
  summary: weather_Summary
  temperature: weather_Temperature
  timestamp: Int
  wind: weather_Wind
}

type weather_Wind {
  deg: Int
  speed: Float
}

Custom.UpstreamSchema:
directive @cacheControl(maxAge: Int, scope: CacheControlScope) on FIELD_DEFINITION | INTERFACE | OBJECT

enum CacheControlScope {
  PRIVATE
  PUBLIC
}

type City {
  coord: Coordinates
  country: String
  id: ID
  name: String
  weather: Weather
}

type Clouds {
  all: Int
  humidity: Int
  visibility: Int
}

input ConfigInput {
  lang: Language
  units: Unit
}

type Coordinates {
  lat: Float
  lon: Float
}

enum Language {
  af
  al
  ar
  az
  bg
  ca
  cz
  da
  de
  el
  en
  es
  eu
  fa
  fi
  fr
  gl
  he
  hi
  hr
  hu
  id
  it
  ja
  kr
  la
  lt
  mk
  nl
  no
  pl
  pt
  pt_br
  ro
  ru
  se
  sk
  sl
  sp
  sr
  sv
  th
  tr
  ua
  uk
  vi
  zh_cn
  zh_tw
  zu
}

type Query {
  getCityById(config: ConfigInput, id: [String!]): [City]
  getCityByName(config: ConfigInput, country: String, name: String!): City
}

type Summary {
  description: String
  icon: String
  title: String
}

type Temperature {
  actual: Float
  feelsLike: Float
  max: Float
  min: Float
}

enum Unit {
  imperial
  kelvin
  metric
}

"""The `Upload` scalar type represents a file upload."""
scalar Upload

type Weather {
  clouds: Clouds
  summary: Summary
  temperature: Temperature
  timestamp: Int
  wind: Wind
}

type Wind {
  deg: Int
  speed: Float
}
